General.Name: PCC Exol SA
General.Description: PCC Exol S.A. manufactures and distributes surfactants in Poland and internationally. The company provides anionic and nonionic surfactants. It primarily serves household and industrial chemical, textile, plastic, industrial cleaning, metal working, and other industries. The company is headquartered in Brzeg Dolny, Poland. PCC Exol S.A. is a subsidiary of PCC SE.
